personalInfo.splInterest: Fantasy football, basketball, fishing, riding four-wheelers

tourBios.carHigh: Played on the NGA Tour in 2011-2013...Had not competed in a PGA TOUR or Web.com Tour event prior to 2014.
tourBios.otherCarHigh: Played on 2005 Regional 1A championship team in high school...Won the 2010 St. Augustine Amateur Championship, the 2009 Gate Invitational and the 2009 Platinum Coast Amateur Championship...Was named Divsion II All-American in 2011.
tourBios.personal: Attended Hilliard (Fla.) Middle Senior High School...turned to golf when he ruined his arm playing baseball, was too short for basketball...Played varsity basketball in 2009-10 and 2010-11..Earliest golf memory was his first par, which came after his tee shot hit a cart path and rolled onto the green leading to a two-putt par...If not a professional golfer, would be a math teacher...Favorite coureses are Yale Golf Club and Pablo Creek in Jacksonville...Would like to play St. Andrews and Pebble Beach...Favorite teams are Florida State and Jacksonville Jaguars...Favorite TV show is "Big Bang Theory" and "How I Met Your Mother"...Favorite movie is "Happy Gilmore"...Favorite food is grilled cheese...Favorite athletes are Kobe Bryant and Michael Jordan...Favorite vacation spot is Bahamas/Jamaica...Wanted to be a baseball player before turning to golf...Bucket list includes playing Augusta National, traveling the world and owning his own golf course...First tee introduction song would be "Separate Ways" by Journey...Twitter name is @cbray033.
